Text:
Good Films -
this is definitely a keeper for my collection. Thanks for this early 70s Boorman classic

Hey Man, Could you please upload 'The Three musketeers' in the DVD 5 size. i.e. around 4.36 GB.
I love your work man but i can't download big sized movies.

Even with the russian audio removed there is still
some russian text with www.e-burg.org
burnt into the beginning of this film.

Why on earth would you ruin a good film with that crap...!!!
